A

addBoxes(int, int) - Method in class JavaCool303.Cool303Root
Add Containers to root
The number of containers and components they hold depends on user input Input 2 integers for number of containers and components Hardcode the layout of the root and a static resize condition if root has more containers that it can fit To populate each container with components call addButtons(int, java.lang.String) The title to be used for each container is hardcoded in the code below
addBoxes(int, int, Theme) - Method in class JavaCool303.Cool303Root
Add themed Containers to root
Overloaded method with a Theme object as input The method is implemented the same way but checks what type of theme is given to apply theme if possible Input a Theme Object to apply a color to this root
addButtons(int, String) - Method in class JavaCool303.Cool303Containers
Add Components to Container
The number of components and the title of the container they hold depends on user input
Input an integer for number components to add Hardcode the layout of the container and a static resize condition if container has more components that it can fit To populate each container with components create Cool303Components with JLabels Add an actionListener for each component: when it is clicked,print its label to console
addButtons(int, String, Theme) - Method in class JavaCool303.Cool303Containers
Add themed Containers to root
Overloaded method with a Theme object as input
The method is implemented the same way but checks what type of theme is given to apply theme if possible
Input a Theme Object to apply a color to this container and its components as they are created
